Author: Noxbox
Title: [ANN][ICO] Noxbox - world of services in a single click
Body: Thank you for warm words! You can see our plan in git repository. There are issues we are working on now - https://github.com/Lipnevich/noxbox/issues.  Now there are only English and Russian languages. We are going to add translations in September, 2018. In case you want to help us with some language translation we will be happy to send you all messages from both applications.  Our plan - create world labor exchange where everyone can offer service or request it.

Author: Noxbox
Title: [ANN][ICO] Noxbox - world of services in a single click
Body: Yup! We are open source and each company can create its own application for employees. We can help with initial system setup. Now cloud service processing cost about 1 cent per one service (find customer for performer, help to find each other with map, process payment, store history and rating). There is no payments for idle time. Even 2 cents application fee generates 1 cent profit. For comparison - Uber take 20% as a fee now.

Author: Noxbox
Title: [ANN][ICO] Noxbox - world of services in a single click
Body: Hey! We already migrated from block io to Waves. Now  Transaction time now is 1-2 seconds. Transaction fee is fixed and costs about 0.005 USD  You are welcome to download application in Play Market and test main functionality - send money to application wallet, refund to specified address, find performer, request performer, check history, dislike if needed  We are going to provide small Waves amount for new users for testing application.

Author: Noxbox
Title: [ANN][ICO] Noxbox - world of services in a single click
Body: We are going to start with all countries on all planets with access to Internet and smartphones.  Decentralised platform for services - it is our final goal. Everyone will be able to provide their services to everyone, and Noxbox will guaranty high rating and payments for users.

Author: Noxbox
Title: [ANN][ICO] Noxbox - world of services in a single click
Body: Right now we use cloud functions for clear and safe Bitcoin transactions. We are going to use Waves smart contracts (it will be added in April 2018) after ICO. you can check our algo in our Firebase functions from git repo https://github.com/Lipnevich/noxbox/tree/master/functions/functions

Author: Noxbox
Title: [ANN][ICO] Noxbox - world of services in a single click
Body: there are three main investors privileges now:  The company profit will be distributed among token holders once a quarter Token holders providing services in the Noxbox application will receive an additional bonus for the service provided Token holders receiving services in the Noxbox application will receive a discount on the received service

Author: Noxbox
Title: [ANN][ICO] Noxbox - world of services in a single click
Body: Thank you for warm words. What kind of progress are you expecting before enrolling?

Author: Noxbox
Title: [ANN][ICO] Noxbox - world of services in a single click
Body: Hmm.. Decentralised self-regulated all over the world available by design crypto-powered YouDo like service.  There is a list of our advantages:  Ratings will be wrote in open blockchain - so there is no need to trust anyone, it will not be possible to change or remove ratings We are working on biometric (two eyes recognition) identification, so it will be hard to recreate account for low raited user Noxbox is services on demand, you will see all performers online and receive needed service in 5-15 minutes, no need to wait your request processing Globality - you will be able to continue providing or receiving services in other countries with your current rating and history

Author: Noxbox
Title: [ANN][ICO] Noxbox - world of services in a single click
Body: Since Noxbox is global by design - there no way to relay on single certificate - almost each country and even city has own certificate type, so we are going guaranty services quality with: Incoming ratings - only high rated users will be able to provide and receive services Outgoing ratings - haters that dislike everyone will be lose their ratings really quick Probationary period for new performers - in case of bad quality for first 10 provided services performer will earn nothing, money will be distributed among token holders in current quarter Our own certificate for high rated performers will be introduced in the next year  As you can see there is a straight way for talented or self-educated performers to work in Noxbox. And only consumers of their services will certify them.

Author: Noxbox
Title: [ANN][ICO] Noxbox - world of services in a single click
Body: Thank you for checking us out. Since our source is open, please feel free to create your own application to provide your service all over the world - we will give you any additional instruction for it if needed. Or join our development team - there is still a lot of work for UI improvements (Android), waves wallet implementation (NodeJs) and functions logic (NodeJs)

Author: Noxbox
Title: [ANN][ICO] Noxbox - world of services in a single click
Body: You are free to do it! Noxbox will never fine users for personal agreements, our main goal to save our users time, guaranty payments and high quality of services.  We will introduce favourites list soon where you can store your favourite performer and Noxbox will try to connect you with them first.  We are really confident that there is no lack of clients who are travelling and are not able to take their favourite hairdresser or masseur with them.  In the same way we are sure that it is more convenient for performer to go work any time he want in a single click instead of waiting for clients in salon or make personal agreement for each client and create and support detailed schedule by himself.

Right now we are 1) Listings in exchanges Yobit, EXMO, Binance, HitBTC, LiveCoin, Poloniex, Bittrex, Bitstamp were requested and are being processed now 2) To increase availability of NBX token we are working on it integration with crypto ATMs 3) Negotiations are under way to jointly develop applications with IBA and EPAM  We focused on ICO now and will continue working on Project in March.

Title: [ANN][ICO] Noxbox - world of services in a single click
Body: In a few words - we are working on service that let each person on Earth help each other, pay or earn cryptocurrency, rate each other.

Author: Noxbox
Title: [ANN][ICO] Noxbox - world of services in a single click
Body: I really hope so!   Honestly, I would be afraid to keep a purse on the android. The greatest number of viruses is on android. How will the clients' money be protected?  You are right, native Android protection is not good enough. There are two additional layers of protection for your money: application use known and protected block.io service API for creating wallets and processing payments we also use Google cloud based logic to guaranty correct payment processing  You can check this logic by yourself on our open source https://github.com/Lipnevich/noxbox

Author: icool
Title: [ANN][ICO] Noxbox - world of services in a single click
Body: Hey guys! I have a question about your app. Will it be also possible to acquire services that are not dependant on your location and location of the service provider? For instance if I want to hire a developer using your app? Thanks!

Author: Noxbox
Title: [ANN][ICO] Noxbox - world of services in a single click
Body: Not exactly, money will be transferred after completion of work. About rating - we don't want to bother our users at all, so rating (actually like) will be set automatically. But you can change it with dislike any time you decide so.

Author: Noxbox
Title: [ANN][ICO] Noxbox - world of services in a single click
Body: Thank you for the nice question. Each service will have an availability rating. For example in case you want a haircut there is no need to call hairdresser from other city, so availability radius will be small (about 2 km), in case you need help with repairing your car availability radius will be much bigger (about 50 km). We was not thinking about providing developer's services in Noxbox yet, but technically it is easy to do with an increasing availability radius to 20000 km.
